Body:
Description: Dear Team,

We have MacOS machines , we were not able to connect VDI , if we disabled the DPI we can able to access VDI and we can able to upload,but if we enabled DPI we are facing issues in MacOS.

Regards,
Sai

What We've Learned Updated: - User is using “Windows App” Application to connect VDI - not an exit point
- issue happens with Intercept VPN on and off
Next Steps Updated: waiting on RS to check further

Next Steps Updated: waiting on RS to check further
3rd party security solution that might interfere with network traffic, like antivirus, VPN, firewall etc

Next Steps Updated: waiting on RS to check further
MTP scanning
3rd party security solution that might interfere with network traffic, like antivirus, VPN, firewall etc

What We've Learned Updated: - User is using “Windows App” Application to connect VDI - not an exit point
- issue happens with Intercept VPN on and off
- VPN intercept - off - not working with CAP policies
- issues happen randomly
- certificate not added to some computers
